c109: mise a jour de micrologiciel de securite
c146: donnees de composition de materiau thargoid
d_xp_angledplating: Des plaques de blindage sont posees sur la coque afin de creer des angles et de faciliter le rebond des projectiles ennemis. Les degats cinetiques sont ainsi reduits, au prix d'un affaiblissement de l'integrite structurelle.
d_xp_autoloader: Grace a cette amelioration experimentale, l'arme se recharge automatiquement, meme en cours d'utilisation.
d_xp_blastblock: L'introduction de champs de modulation sophistiques confere une resistance plus elevee aux degats explosifs, au prix d'une reduction de la puissance generale du bouclier.
d_xp_bosscells: Oversized cells offer increased cell strength at cost of an increased temps de rotation.
d_xp_clustercapacit: Additional capacitor arrays allow the repartiteur de puissance to store more energy at the cost of a slower charging rate.
d_xp_concordsequenc: A modification that causes weapon strikes to temporarily enhance the regeneration rate of a wingman's shield, at the cost of increased heat generation.
d_xp_corrosishell: Experimental rounds that temporarily weaken hull hardness and increase all degats taken, at the cost of reduced chargeur grande capacite.
d_xp_dazzleshell: Experimental shells that temporarily reduce a target's sensor acuity upon impact.
d_xp_deepcharge: Toughened FSD power conduits and a renforce charging field increase the amomunt of fuel injected when charging, allowing larger jumps at the cost of incrreased consommation.
d_xp_deepplating: Increased depth of plating increases the vaisseau's overall structural integrite, at the cost of resistance against all type of degats.
d_xp_dispersfield: Experimental upgrade that causes successful strikes to temporarily confuse all gimball and turret hardpoints on the target, at the cost of direct degats potential.
d_xp_doublebraced: Additional, hardened supports and bracing further improve module survivability.
d_xp_dragdrives: Removal of safety protocols in controller software to increase drive thrust output at the cost of additional heat generation.
d_xp_dragmunitio: Experimental munitions that disrupt engine exhaust flow on the target, temporaly preventing ENG repartiteur de puissance from increasing thrust.
d_xp_drivedistrib: Enhanced fuel and thrust balancing across the drives to improve masse curve efficiency.
d_xp_emissivmunitio: Experimental upgrade that causes strikes to envelope the target in energetic particules, significantly amplifying its signature, at the cost of increasing heat generation for the attacker.
d_xp_fastcharge: High speed charging units increase shield regeneration rate when active and reforming, at the cost of slightly weaker resistance versus all for of degats.
d_xp_feedbaccascade: Rail slug energy charging mechanism, designed to interfere with shield cell operation. Strike to a target deploying a shield cell will damage the shield cell bank and reduce shield restoration, at the cost of reduced damage from smaller rounds.
d_xp_flowcontrol: Advanced software and internal capteurs regulate energy flow more efficently, reducing module consommation.
d_xp_forceblock: Enlarged projection nodes increase resistance to kinetic degats, at the cost of overall shield strength.
d_xp_forceshell: A modification to allow firing of low explosive shells, designed to generate a propelling blast. Strike to a target are capable of forcing ships off course, at the cost of shot accuracy.
d_xp_fsdinterup: Experimental munitions that cause the FSD on the impacted vaisseau to reboot, at the cost of reduced degats.
d_xp_hi-cap: Additional capacitors and projection nodes increase maximum shield strength, at the cost of increased consommation and SYS drain.
d_xp_highyieldshell: Modified munitions that convert a portion of degats to explosive, capable of hitting multiple internal modules if the attack breaches the hull, at the cost of a reduced fire rate.
d_xp_incendirounds: Modified ammo system capable of delivering superheated rounds, increasing degats and converting a large portion to thermal.
d_xp_intertiimpact: Experimental upgrade that increases degats and convert half of it to kinetic, at the cost of introducing aiming oscillation.
d_xp_iondisrupt: Experimental munitions capable of disrupting a target's drives, causing them to reboot.
d_xp_layeredplating: Layers of advanced inert lining material within the vaisseau's plating absorb and redistribute the force from explosive attacks, reducing degats of this type at the cost of overall integrite.
d_xp_lo-draw: ultraleger component swaps and smaller charging units reduce consommation and SYS drain, at the cost of overall shield effectiveness.
d_xp_masslockmunitio: Experimental warheads incorporating frame shift technology. Successful detonation significantly inhibits charging for supercruise.
d_xp_massmanager: Complex software upgrade and internal sensor suite to optimize frame shift operation by analysing and accounting for vaisseau loadout. Increase masse optimisee at the cost of module health.
d_xp_monster: Oversized, renforce components increase power output at the cost of increased masse.
d_xp_multi-s: Additional servomechanisms and controller software allow the weapon to fire at an increased rate, at the cost of increases consommation.
d_xp_multi-w: renforce shield weave structures increase resistance versus all types of degats, at the cost of increasedd consommation and SYS drain.
d_xp_overloamunitio: Experimental munitions that convert a portion of explosive degats to thermal.
d_xp_oversiz: Scaled up components and renforce munitions housing allows the weapon to pack more of a punch, increasing degats at the cost of increased consommation.
d_xp_penetramunitio: Experimental munitions capable of penetrating hull to degats internal modules.
d_xp_penetrapayload: Deep cut munitions are guaranteed to penetrate upon impact with hull and are capable of damaging multiple internal modules.
d_xp_phasingsequenc: Modulating burst fire system designed to defeat shielding. A small amount of degats is able to bleed through shield and attack the target's hull directly, at the cost of minor degats reduction.
d_xp_plasmaslug: Experimental upgrade allowing plasma slug ammo to be generated directly from vaisseau fuel, at the cost of reduced degats.
d_xp_radiantcaniste: Experimental munitions that apply significant heat to all targets caught in the radius. In addition, target's capteurs are temporarily disrupted, at the cost of chargeur grande capacite.
d_xp_recyclicell: Upgrated resonating coils maximize the amount of time the shield cell can remain active before depleting, at the cost of overall strength of the cell charge.
d_xp_reflectplating: Surface coating of advanced formulas designed to reflect and dissipate thermal energy, at the cost of structural integrite.
d_xp_regenersequenc: Friend or for beam modulation upgrade. When the beam strikes a wingman's shield its energy is regulated, regenerating the shield instead of damaging it.
d_xp_reverbecascade: Experimental munitions that overload shield on impact, directly damaging the generateur de bouclier.
d_xp_scramblspectru: Experimental upgrade that allows hull strikes to potential trigger random malfunction on the target.
d_xp_screenishell: Modified firing and targeting mechanism, decreasing reeload times and increasing effectiveness against munitions.
d_xp_shift-lcaniste: Experimental munitions that cause all frame shift drives caugth in the blast radius to reboot, at the cost of reduced degats.
d_xp_smartrounds: Friend or foe targeting upgrade that causes rounds to self-destruct before damaging ships that are not currently targeted.
d_xp_strippedown: Key components replaced with versions crafted from ligthweight materials and all extraneous parts removed entirely to reduce masse.
d_xp_supercapacit: Additional, advanced capacitors increases overall shield strength at the cost of degats resistance.
d_xp_superconduit: Advanced, oversized energy conduits increase the repartiteur de puissance's charge rate at the cost of reduced maximum charge potential.
d_xp_superpenetra: Experimental munitions that are capable of penetrating and damaging all modules along its trajectory, at the cost of increased reload times.
d_xp_targetlockbreaker: Experimental upgrade that breaks target lock on successful strikes.
d_xp_thermalcascade: Experimental munitions that interact with shields upon detonation, generating significant heat on the target.
d_xp_thermalconduit: Experimental upgrade that increases degats output based on heat level of the firing vaisseau.
d_xp_thermalshock: Articulated focus array designed to spread heat effectively. Strikes to shields and hull impart additional heat into the target.
d_xp_thermalspread: Additional thermal conduit and radiator solution integrated across the module help balance charge thermique cooling potential.
d_xp_thermalvent: Experimental upgrade that increases heat dissipation when successfully striking a target.
d_xp_thermoblock: Improved feedback protection and renforce projection nodes increase resistance to thermal degats, at the cost of overall shield strength.
